amendment.description: To ease Federal burdens on State and local governments recovering from catastrophic events.

action.text: Amendment SA 3585 proposed by Senator Toomey.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3585, under the order of 7/23/2014, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 50. Record Vote Number: 247.
